abstract: Chinese Pres Xi Jinping's pledge to put in place cap-and-trade system in 2017 strikes at heart of one of chief reasons Republican lawmakers have resisted any legislation that would curb greenhouse gas emissions in United States; neither Republican lawmakers nor party's presidential candidates seem to think Xi's pledge warrants change in their position.
lead_paragraph: President Xi Jinping’s plan for China to implement a cap-and-trade system recalled President Obama’s failure to overcome Republican opposition to a similar policy.

headline.main: Beijing Puts Ball Back in Washington’s Court on Climate Change
headline.print_headline: Beijing Puts Ball Back in Washington’s Court in Fight to Curb Climate Change

snippet: President Xi Jinping’s plan for China to implement a cap-and-trade system recalled President Obama’s failure to overcome Republican opposition to a similar policy.

keywords.value: Carbon Caps and Emissions Trading Programs
